subject: Deprecate config options for image locations

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

messages.message:
Patch Set 1: Workflow-1

Need some deep thoughts on current approach because it seems that it was not designed correctly.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

This patch has been -1ed because it has not been updated in
>=2months. The patch also has either a -1/-2 from a core reviewer or a
-1 from Jenkins.

Please, update/rebase the patch if the lack of updates was actually a
lack of reviews or if you think the patch is still relevant.

**NOTE: This will be abandoned if no update is done in 1 week.**

If this action does not seem accurate, please, ping flaper87 on IRC
and he will gladly revert it. Sorry for the inconvenience and we look
forward to have more contributions from you.

Abandoned

I see no movement on this patch. Please reopen as/when you find appropriate.
